entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to switch .NET MAUI Flyout of Shell to the right with FlowDirection? #15221
  • xmlns can't access its classes #15217
  • On iOS Launcher.OpenAsync presents Open-In/ShareSheet Menu but closes immediately (.net MAUI) #15216
  • Assets file '.../MauiTutorialProject/obj/project.assets.json' not found. Run NuGet package restore to generate this file. #15215
  • RadioButton rendered incorrectly in MacCatalyst #15214
  • VS 2022 on Mac OS renders CheckBox as round with MacCatalyts/iPad Mini Target #15213
  • [NET 8, Windows] wrong initial BindingConext in CollectionView DataTemplate #15212
  • Hamburger icon is not visible when using flyout with Flyout Page #15211
  • TextColor throws exception on Windows Machine #15210
  • Rendering of CollectionView takes too much time #15204

Closed

  • [Windows] MAUI app crashes when XAML Hot Reloading ShellContent within Shell.xaml #13775
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI conversion of SVG text into PNG is incorrect. #11302
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Sending POST API method in iOS using hot restart is not working #15075
  • Having Shell NavBar Visible shortens visible part of the page on the bottom #14914
    Backlog
  • ScrollView does not scrollable to the End after window height resized. #8113
    Backlog
  • DatePicker and TimePicker opened unexpectedly when navigating back to previous page on Android API 21 and 23 #8130
  • Unable to add a certificate to iOS keychain #15068

PullRequests

Created

  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
  • Implements Color.Equal() correctly #15218
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs (Backport #14704) #15208
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0.1 to 1.9.0 #15206
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [shell] [windows] fix NRE when clearing shell items #15220
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Bump coverlet.collector from 3.2.0 to 6.0.0 #15207
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net8.] Merge main #15186
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
